useEslint.title: ESLint Integration
useEslint.description:
Use [prettier-eslint](https://github.com/prettier/prettier-eslint) to infer your Prettier settings based on your ESLint config. If we cannot infer a Prettier setting from your ESLint config (or if there is none in the current project), we will fallback to using your settings in the *Prettier Options* section.

**Note:** If you enable *Format on Save*, we recommend disabling ESlint's auto-fix to prevent fixing your code twice.

useEditorConfig.title: EditorConfig Integration
useEditorConfig.description:
Use [EditorConfig](http://editorconfig.org/) configuration to load project-based settings for Prettier formatting.
Takes precedence over your settings. The following settings will be overriden if they are found in your `.editorconfig`: **Use tabs**, **Tab width**, **Print width**.

enabled.title: Format Files on Save
enabled.description: Automatically format entire file when saving.

respectEslintignore.title: Ignore Files in `.eslintignore`
respectEslintignore.description: Works regardless of whether *ESLint Integration* is enabled or not.

showInStatusBar.title: Show in Status Bar
showInStatusBar.description: Show in status bar if *Format on Save* is enabled or not.

javascriptScopes.title: JavaScript Scopes
javascriptScopes.description:
Select which files containing JavaScript should be formatted.
Use the command `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

typescriptScopes.title: TypeScript Scopes
typescriptScopes.description:
Select which files containing TypeScript should be formatted.
Use the command `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

cssScopes.title: CSS Scopes
cssScopes.description:
Select which files containing CSS should be formatted.
Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

jsonScopes.title: JSON Scopes
jsonScopes.description:
Select which files containing JSON should be formatted.
Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

graphQlScopes.title: GraphQL Scopes
graphQlScopes.description:
Select which files containing GraphQL should be formatted.
Use `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

excludedGlobs.title: Exclude (list of globs)
excludedGlobs.description: A list of file globs to exclude from formatting on save (takes precedence over scopes). Use commas to separate each glob.

whitelistedGlobs.title: Include (list of globs)
whitelistedGlobs.description:
A list of file globs to always format on save (takes precedence over scopes and excluded globs). Use commas to separate each glob.

**Note:** If there are globs in this list, files not matching the globs will not be formatted on save, regardless of other options.

isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.title: Only format if Prettier is found in your project's dependencies
isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.description: Only format on save when `prettier` (or `prettier-eslint`/`prettier-eslint-cli` if using *ESLint integration*) is in your project's `package.json` (dependencies or devDependencies)

singleQuote.title: Single Quotes
singleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes for strings.

bracketSpacing.title: Bracket Spacing
bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces inside of object literals.

semi.title: Semicolons
semi.description: Add semicolons at the end of statements.

useTabs.title: Use Tabs
useTabs.description: Indent lines with tabs instead of spaces.

jsxBracketSameLine.title: JSX Bracket Same Line
jsxBracketSameLine.description: Put > on the same line in JSX.

printWidth.title: Print Width
printWidth.description: Fit lines of code within this length.

tabWidth.title: Tab Width
tabWidth.description: Number of spaces to use per tab. Put `auto` to use your editor's tab width setting.

parser.title: JavaScript Parser
parser.description: Choose which [supported parser](https://www.npmjs.com/package/prettier#language-support) to use. (Does not apply to TypeScript, CSS or JSON)
